mapper.insert: insert into FT_Folder (ID, NAME, FOLDER_TYPE, P_FOLDER_ID, FOLDER_LEV, REMARK, FOLDER_SPACE, VIEW_AUTH_USERS, DOWNLOAD_AUTH_USERS, UPLOAD_AUTH_USERS, COLLECT_USER, FOLD_UPLOAD_URL, FOLD_DOWNLOAD_URL, SHARE_CODE, SHARE_PASD, SHARE_TYPE, SHARE_DUE_DATE, COM_ID, DEL_FLG, UP_USER, UP_DATE, CR_USER, CR_DATE) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{folderType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pFolderId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{folderLev,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{folderSpace,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{viewAuthUsers,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{downloadAuthUsers,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{uploadAuthUsers,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{collectUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{foldUploadUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{foldDownloadUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{shareCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sharePasd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{shareType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{shareDueDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{comId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{delFlg,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{upUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{upDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{crUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{crDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update FT_Folder set NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FOLDER_TYPE = #{folderType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, P_FOLDER_ID = #{pFolderId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, FOLDER_LEV = #{folderLev,jdbcType=INTEGER}, REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FOLDER_SPACE = #{folderSpace,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, VIEW_AUTH_USERS = #{viewAuthUsers,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DOWNLOAD_AUTH_USERS = #{downloadAuthUsers,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPLOAD_AUTH_USERS = #{uploadAuthUsers,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, COLLECT_USER = #{collectUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FOLD_UPLOAD_URL = #{foldUploadUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FOLD_DOWNLOAD_URL = #{foldDownloadUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SHARE_CODE = #{shareCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SHARE_PASD = #{sharePasd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SHARE_TYPE = #{shareType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SHARE_DUE_DATE = #{shareDueDate,jdbcType=DATE}, COM_ID = #{comId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, DEL_FLG = #{delFlg,jdbcType=CHAR}, UP_USER = #{upUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UP_DATE = #{upDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CR_USER = #{crUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CR_DATE = #{crDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select ID, NAME, FOLDER_TYPE, P_FOLDER_ID, FOLDER_LEV, REMARK, FOLDER_SPACE, VIEW_AUTH_USERS, DOWNLOAD_AUTH_USERS, UPLOAD_AUTH_USERS, COLLECT_USER, FOLD_UPLOAD_URL, FOLD_DOWNLOAD_URL, SHARE_CODE, SHARE_PASD, SHARE_TYPE, SHARE_DUE_DATE, COM_ID, DEL_FLG, UP_USER, UP_DATE, CR_USER, CR_DATE from FT_Folder where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select ID, NAME, FOLDER_TYPE, P_FOLDER_ID, FOLDER_LEV, REMARK, FOLDER_SPACE, VIEW_AUTH_USERS, DOWNLOAD_AUTH_USERS, UPLOAD_AUTH_USERS, COLLECT_USER, FOLD_UPLOAD_URL, FOLD_DOWNLOAD_URL, SHARE_CODE, SHARE_PASD, SHARE_TYPE, SHARE_DUE_DATE, COM_ID, DEL_FLG, UP_USER, UP_DATE, CR_USER, CR_DATE from FT_Folder
